Title: Uncle Lei Feng tells revolutionary stories
Designer: Wu Zhefu (吴哲夫)Yang Yuhua (杨玉华)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Lei Feng is reading from a book on Huang Jiguang, a soldier who died in the Korean War and got a martyr status.The children with the red scarves are Pioneers, members of the Communist youth organization.This poster was first published in November 1963. The poster shown here is from the 15th edition, February 1965, to a total print run of 2,753,590 copies.
